title: Leaverbuster
body: I was playing a bot game with a low-levelled friend today and during the game I disconnected. As soon as Ileft the game I rejoined (as in clicked on the reconnect button as soon as it appeared) but I somehow got a leaverbuster after that. Why? It was less than a minute I was gone for. I reconnected ASAP. How does that warrant a leaverbuster?

replies.body: Ai vs Coop is still a matchmade game, so even if you are against bots there are still real players on your team.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system will still penalize players for leaving in these cases and with a history of leaving more than just 1 game.  Let me know if that clears things up!
